review: Love, love, love this fire TV. This has got to be one of the best purchases that I have ever made. Amazon Fire TV is far above the competition in ease of use, and number of apps. With Fire TV I now have no need for cable or satellite in my home, I have now cut the cord and have started saving money while having even more channels to watch. Recommend this to everyone. Great job Amazon.
author: Patricia M.

review: As usual Amazon has given me a great product. The voice control is amazing. The choice of movies and tv shows is excellent. I would recommend that you join Amazon Prime in order to get the most value from this product.  But then I can't imagine not having Prime. I have a kindle and a Kindle Fire and also order many items from Amazon so the Prime pays for itself. This is a great product. Just wish I had gotten it at the sale price:)
author: lynda bower

review: My Fire TV only worked properly for a few days. After that, the voice search would stop working. When I would contact support they would have me reset the machine to factory defaults. This would cure the problem for another few days. Finally, I returned it, but instead of sending me one that works, they "refunded" my account $67.20, deducting shipping and restocking fees; although why a broken Fire TV would be restocked is beyond me. I find this pretty odd because other items by 3rd parties get a full refund from Amazon. NOTE: I did order a Fire Stick since then and it has worked fine, it's just missing the voice feature unless you use your iPhone.
author: ChazMarlboro
